pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā antaraghare nisīdanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca mahāhasitaṃ hasanto antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
